document.docAuthor: Santana, Larissa, Benetti, Cesar João, Clarkson, Bruno & Pes, Ana Maria
document.masterDocTitle: On the genus Berosus Leach (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae) in the State of Roraima Brazil: description of three new species and new records
